text:
Saturday morning check list: 
wake up and shower 
Order @GemmaAnneStyles new Paradise City sunnies in blue 
Get so excited about my new shades I forgot my coffee on top of the car and drove off  

CONGRATS GEMMA! They are hella siiiick!

html: Painless! There's a huge shortage of blood right now to the point it's a crisis. It's also really fun, take a friend, clench your butt muscles... @Gemmastyles has done it 5 TIMES AND SHE HAS A FEAR OF NEEDLES. html: We’ve spent the morning at the Luton Blood Donor Centre! Stocks of O- are especially low right now this is the blood type given to casualties in an emergency so it’s really important to keep supplies up. MAKE AN APPOINTMENT TODAY http://blood.co.uk  #giveblood pic.twitter.com/nn6rKjFMQn
text: We’ve spent the morning at the Luton Blood Donor Centre! Stocks of O- are especially low right now  this is the blood type given to casualties in an emergency so it’s really important to keep supplies up. MAKE AN APPOINTMENT TODAY http://blood.co.uk  #giveblood pic.twitter.com/nn6rKjFMQn

html: My 5-yr-old client can’t tell me what country she is from. We prepare her case by drawing pictures with crayons of the gang members that would wait outside her school.
